title: The Sunday Lowdown
subtitle: How we roll on a Sunday morning

philosophy.heading: The Sunday Vibe
philosophy.content: Honestly, we're just here for the fresh air and the post-run coffee and bacon. Running by yourself can be a bit of a slog, so we get together to make it more of a social thing. No one's checking their watch, no one's comparing PBs (even if they're tracking them!), and we definitely aren't checking your ID at the door. If you just fancy getting moving on a Sunday morning, you're one of us.

vibes.heading: No Pressure, Just Hangs
vibes.content: Leave the pressure at home. Sunday is our day to switch off the 'serious runner' brain (if you have one). We loop back, we wait for the back of the pack, and we talk... a lot. It‚Äôs basically a coffee morning that happens to involve some light jogging.

values.title: All Paces Welcome
values.description: Whether you're a speedster or more of a saunterer, you'll fit right in.

values.title: Post-Run Breakfast/Coffee
values.description: We always end with coffee and chats. It's the real reason we turn up.

values.title: Always Out There
values.description: We're there every Sunday, come rain or shine. Getting a bit muddy is part of the fun.

values.title: Just Turn Up
values.description: No sign-ups, no fees, no awkward intros. Just show up and say hi!

values.title: Birthday Runs
values.description: We're always up for a birthday run, so let us know if you'd like to join us for a special run with cake!

values.title: Special Events
values.description: We're always up for a special event, like Christmas Day Parkruns or charity runs - keep an eye on our Events page for more info.

location.heading: Where to Find Us
location.content:
We set off every Sunday at 9:00 AM from the Bingham Market Place (there'll always be some folks there a little earlier for a natter). Look for the group of friendly people in running gear (and probably some excited dogs)!

Afterwards, we head to Gilt for a well-earned breakfast - but if you have to shoot off, that's fine too!
